name: Eighty/20 Results - Single Use Trial Memberships for Paid Memberships Pro
author: Thomas Sjolshagen <thomas@eighty20results.com>

sections.description: Only allow a Paid Memberships Pro member to sign up for a trial membership level once.
sections.changelog:
2.0

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Use the E20R Utilities module for sanitizing REQUEST variables
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Use the E20R Utilities module to handle plugin update logic
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Updated copyright notice

1.2

  1. BUG/ENHANCEMENT: Expanded to allow single-use configuration for any membership type, not just free levels.

1.1

  1. ENH/BUG: Added custom boolval() for ancient versions of PHP

1.0.3

  1. ENH: Add GPL v2 license text to source file(s)
  2. ENH: Add descriptive text to settings section on Membership Level definition page

1.0.3

  1. BUG: Didn't always load settings on page

1.0.2

  1. BUG/ENH: Make e20r_force_tls_12() pluggable
  2. ENH: Add header text to settings page

1.0.1

  1. Adding debug capabilities

1.0

  1. Initial Release of the add-on
sections.faq:
I found a bug in the plugin.

Please report your issue to us by using the Support Forum on The Eighty / 20 Website and we'll try to respond within 1 business day to your initial inquiry.
